name: Hl7VSNatureOfChallenge
title: hl7VS-natureOfChallenge
description: Value Set of codes that further describe an observation definition that is characterized as a challenge observation.

contains.display: Fasting (no calorie intake) for the period specified in the time component of the term, e.g., 1H POST CFST
Exercise undertaken as challenge (can be quantified)
No fluid intake for the period specified in the time component of the term
